0: There was some issues checking in with the front desk being closed due to their hours
I would have given 5 stars except the Expedia Local Expert desk is dishonest
Apparently it sometimes takes a while so the women at the front desk called reservations to check in on the process
There is a desk where i would assume they try to sell you something I stayed clear of that desk and was never asked about anything during my stay

On site facilities consisted of two pools a kidie pool and a hot tub next to the reception building housing check in a timeshare sales desk lounge area game room and room with two computers with internet access and a printer
A very small fitness room is also housed in the reception building
1: The front desk staff were friendly and helpful
Friendly staff and nice clean rooms
Always very easy to check in friendly staff rooms very clean very convenient location for many Orlando attractions We stay here regularly sometimes just one night sometimes longer always find it good
The staff was friendly enough however during check in they inadvertently charged me for the room again at check in
Best most helpful and friendly staff ever
Staff and other things in the units were ok
Great place to stay and wonderful service
The staff were all very friendly pool area was spotles two pools and hot tubs we will be back
